title: Academic Well-Being Promotion Strategies in Live Webcast-Based Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic instructional design skills and leadership experience
context.additional_context: Blended learning environments combining live webcasts and in-person classes for managers/leaders within corporations, with organizational infrastructure supporting digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can explain the seven dimensions (empathy, support, responsiveness, reliability, tangibility, self-efficacy, and resilience) of measuring academic well-being in live webcast classes
Learners can propose at least three collaborative strategies between webcast instructors and local teachers to enhance academic well-being
Learners can design customized well-being support strategies for learner groups and improve them through formative assessment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
